title: The Roots Reggae 25 (Dancing Man's Guide to Music)
description:
This is for those getting into vintage roots reggae and perhaps already more or less familiar with the entry level albums like "War Ina Babylon" and various Trojan offerings. All of the tunes here are certified roots killers one step beyond the most obvious Island material. Enjoy!


01 - Dhaima - Ina Jah Children.mp3
02 - Joe Morgan - Basement Session.mp3
03 - Ijahman - I'm a Levi.mp3
04 - Ras Danhi - Nowhere.mp3
05 - Bunny Wailer - Rise & Shine.mp3
06 - Cornell Campbell & The Brentford Rockers - Natty Don't Go.mp3
07 - Noel Ellis - To Hail Selassie.mp3
08 - Horace Smart - Ruffer Ruff.mp3
09 - Junior Dan - Red, Gold & Green Rainbow.mp3
10 - John Holt - Police in Helicopter.mp3
11 - The Abyssinians - Declaration of Rights.mp3
12 - Winston Francis - Let's Go to Zion.mp3
13 - The Heptones - Deceivers.mp3
14 - Junior Byles - Fade Away.mp3
15 - Culture - I Tried.mp3
16 - The Twinkle Brothers - Jahoviah.mp3
17 - Pablo Moses - Where Am I.mp3
18 - Burning Spear - Cry Blood Africans.mp3
19 - Gregory Isaacs - Poor and Clean.mp3
20 - Carlton Jackson - History.mp3
21 - Israel Vibration - Lift Up Your Conscience.mp3
22 - Johnny Clarke - Babylon.mp3
23 - Dennis Brown - Revolution.mp3
24 - Tyrone Taylor - Life Table.mp3
25 - Sonya Spence - Talk Love.mp3


25 RECOMMENDED ALBUMS

Various - Don't Call Us Immigrants
Various - Jack Ruby Presents The Black Foundation
Various - Jah Love Rockers: Revolutionary Sounds from the Rockers & Steppers Era
Various - Joe Gibbs: Scorchers from The Mighty Two
Various - Keep the Pressure Down: Essential Roots Reggae Rarities
Various - King Jammy in Roots
Various - More Pressure Vol 1: Straight to the Head
Various - Roots & Culture: Serious Selections Vol. 1
Various - Singerman! (Blood & Fire sampler)
Various - Studio One Roots
Various - Yabby You: Jesus Dread 1972-1977
Augustus Pablo & Various - Dub, Reggae & Roots from the Melodica King
Black Uhuru - Guess Who's Coming to Dinner (aka Showcase)
Burning Spear - Marcus Garvey
Culture - Two Sevens Clash
Israel Vibration - The Same Song
Johnny Clarke - A Ruffer Version: Johnny Clarke at King Tubby's 74-78
Johnny Osbourne - Truth and Rights
Lee Scratch Perry & Friends - Open the Gate
Noel Ellis - Noel Ellis
The Chantells & Friends - Children of Jah
The Congos - Heart of The Congos
The Gladiators - Trenchtown Mix-Up
The Mighty Diamonds - Right Time
The Twinkle Brothers - Countrymen

Check out http://www.roots-archives.com/ and http://www.bloodandfire.co.uk/db/viewforum.php?f=1 for further inspiration.
